favourite.article: I love it. But I can't get the tune well and pattern it to the lyrics.. Amen. Lord Jesus cause me to enjoy and know this song for the children's meeting.
ALELUYA!!!!! AMEN!!!! For the Bible from GENESIS TO REVELATION.
This is my favorite song. It teaches me all the people in the Old Testament and if I am sad I would sing it. :)

I really like this song. And I remember singing it for the Parents in Bible Camp. It helps me when I'm flipping through my Bible. I sing this song to myself, and then I get it stuck in my head for the rest of the day.
